text:
Breakouts
 choose the breakout session that you want to work on most:

options.text: What occurs when you lack a test plan?

head: Discover the fascinating world of programming in the SAP universe.
descr: In our interactive one-hour workshop, you'll playfully dive into the many types of program-ming that SAP has to offer and unleash your inner SAP development genius! Thoralf HÃ¤nsel, Eduardo de Andrade, Larissa Bleier, Walter Maier

head: Architecture principles and design patterns in action (Gamified).
descr: Robustness, Onion Layers, Circuit Breakers are application design principles, that  can be hard-to-understand, abstract concepts. Experience architecture principles applied to real world scenarios to understand why you want to use them in your IT solutions. Holger Neub and Product Integration Team.

head: What occurs when you lack a test plan?
descr: Do tests truly adhere to requirement specifications? Absolutely! In this session, we aim to demonstrate how to construct a test strategy, identify its purpose, and set objectives. We'll also cover how to design a test, highlight essential test criteria, and, importantly, how to document test results. Larissa Wissman and Michaela Baron.

head: Future learning based on metaverse.
descr: Learn how to build the metaverse by creating a holographic-based digital twin to enhance the digital learning experience. Leon Fleig.

head: Introduction to AWS WAF
descr: Learn how IT uses the AWS WAF cloud service to block denial of service attacks at the Hau-fe Shop. Lucian Patian.

head: Anatomy of AWS EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service) at different dimensions
descr: In this session we analyze the popular EKS cloud service, based on different aspects of the service. For aspects like security, costs, and maintainability, we will deep dive to identify all the benefits of running Kubernetes as a managed service. Cristian Pirtea.

head: Digital Quality Guide
descr: How to assess processes, rate and optimize them. Bring your process! You can do it live with our support. Patrick Hirt, Christina Steurer.
